snippet: From the beginning of his presidential campaign, Mitt Romney has offered to transfigure himself any which way to achieve power. Nothing’s changed.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Mitt Romney for adopting a superficial moderate tone in order to appease voters in general campaign; accuses him of disguising the deep conservatism he espoused in the primaries and that continues to make up the core of his platform.
lead_paragraph: From the beginning of his presidential campaign, Mitt Romney has offered to transfigure himself any which way to achieve power. Nothing’s changed.
